text: haey chaur puok anak romluk tow champoh a l laoh knong chamnuon thngai del ban kamnt dau che neah anaknea chng branhab( chakchenh pi mi na) knongorypel pir thngai dambaung( nei thngai ta sh ri k) ku kmean tosakamhosa champoh ke laey . chamnek e anaknea del chng ponyearpel( rhautadl thngaiti db bei)noh ka kmean tosakamhosa der samreab anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh . haey chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh ning trauv doeng tha pitabrakd nasa puok anak nung trauv ke bramoulophdom tow champoh trong vinh
